sentences.english: The hoolock gibbon mainly distributes in the mid-mountain humid evergreen broad-leaved forest.
sentences.chinese: 它们主要分布在中山湿性常绿阔叶林。

sentences.english: But this was evergreen country in summer.
sentences.chinese: 但这是夏天常绿的国家。

sentences.english: Two people talking about knows, evergreen think people through ups and downs will grow.
sentences.chinese: 二人聊起知秋的事，常绿认为人经历起伏才会成长。

sentences.english: Lofty figs are tall evergreen trees, reaching 35 metres in height.
sentences.chinese: 高山榕树为高大常绿乔木，可高达35米。

sentences.english: Planting schemes were dominated by indigenous species of evergreens and hardwoods.
sentences.chinese: 种植计划的主要是常绿树和硬木原生品种。

sentences.english: The pine and the cypress remain green all the year round.
Know track for autumn, evergreen to learn from master to do the executioner but was refused.
sentences.chinese: 知秋追来，向常绿拜师学做刽子手但被拒绝。

sentences.english: Bees produce a compound called propolis from the sap on needle-leaved trees or evergreens.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂利用针叶树或常绿植物的汁液制造蜂胶化合物。

sentences.english: With 50% forest coverage, the island is green through all four seasons.
sentences.chinese: 岛上四季常绿，森林覆盖率超过50%。

sentences.english: In additions, evergreen species of Fagaceae were the major dominant species of community composition.
sentences.chinese: 壳斗科的常绿树种是本地主要建群种。

sentences.english: Castanopsis eyrei forest was one of the main forest types in Gutianshan Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 甜槠林是古田山自然保护区常绿阔叶林主要类型之一。

sentences.english: The field is white and the wooded edges dark with evergreen.
sentences.chinese: 野地上银白一片，远处围绕着暗绿色的常绿树木。
澳大拉西亚常绿树木或灌木。

sentences.english: Evergreen namely life he knows you come back, take away the baby.
sentences.chinese: 知秋刚巧回来，常绿即命他带走婴儿。

sentences.english: Bischofia javanica Bl. is a main plant in the tropical and subtropical evergreen monsoon forest.
sentences.chinese: 秋枫为热带和亚热带常绿季雨林中的主要树种。

sentences.english: There is a small evergreen shrub on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 山腰上有一小块常绿灌木丛。

definition: tree, esp. with recognizable trunk (as opposed to 灌木[guan4 mu4], bush or shrub)
Arecaceae or Palmae, the palm family
